name: 99 Spirits - Cage of Night
summary:
The first DLC side story for the game 99 Spirits(https://www.igdb.com/games/99-spirits)

"Features:
 6 Mini Scenarios with in-between scenes from 99 Spirits
 Developer Symposium with commentary by TORaIKI, 99 Spirits' creators.

Includes both an English and Japanese version of Cage of Night."
storyline: 99 Spirits - Cage of Night stars fan-favorites Saki and Komiya, and adds brand new characters. A story of tragic love and foxes’ games told in visual novel style, the Cage of Night is set during the events of 99 Spirits storyline and is set in a darker mood than the main story.
